@sarah_edo @jenlooper @lauragift21 This is me whenever I’ve been at a casino. (Rarely) I assume I’ll loose ALL of my “my ticket to play”. If I lose less, that is... a win. Note- this is probably not the core of a profitable gambling strategy. But it makes me ok with a night playing.
